work.title: Software Engineer

work.title: Software Engineer
work.responsibilites: Designed and developed a Python Django web framework and REST APIs using Django ORM, enabling seamless operations, which managed a high-volume user load exceeding 200,000 users, optimizing performance and reliability. Implemented efficient application deployment on AWS by implementing CI/CD pipelines with Git and Jenkins, resulting in a 17% reduction in build time and optimizing the development lifecycle.

work.title: Software Engineer
